desc_en: The length of a tick in milliseconds, which is the basic time unit used by ZooKeeper. It is used to regulate heartbeats, and timeouts.
desc_zh: 心跳的持续时间（毫秒），是ZooKeeper使用的基本时间单位。用于调节心跳和超时。

desc_en: The maximum time, in ticks, that the leader allows the followers to connect and sync. If followers do not connect within this time, they are dropped.
desc_zh: 领导者允许跟随者连接和同步的最大时间（以tick为单位）。如果跟随者在此时间内未连接，它们将被丢弃。

desc_en: The maximum time, in ticks, that a follower is allowed to be out of sync with the leader. If a follower falls behind by more than this, it will be dropped.
desc_zh: 跟随者允许与领导者不同步的最大时间（以tick为单位）。如果跟随者落后超过此值，它将被丢弃。

desc_en: The number of recent snapshots of the database to retain. When enabled, ZooKeeper will automatically purge the snapshots and corresponding transaction logs.
desc_zh: 要保留的数据库最近快照的数量。启用后，ZooKeeper将自动清除快照和相应的事务日志。

desc_en: The time interval in hours for which the purge task has to be triggered. Set to a positive integer (1 and above) to enable the auto purging.
desc_zh: 触发清除任务的时间间隔（小时）。设置为正整数（1及以上）以启用自动清除。

desc_en: The maximum number of client connections. Set to 0 to disable this limit.
desc_zh: 最大客户端连接数。设置为0以禁用此限制。

desc_en: The maximum session timeout in milliseconds that the server will allow the client to negotiate. Defaults to 20 times the tickTime.
desc_zh: 服务器允许客户端协商的最大会话超时时间（毫秒）。默认为tickTime的20倍。
